content.question: Which of the following individuals best demonstrates the concept of social loafing?

choices.label: Aaron, who runs faster when running with a friend because he feels more motivated
Sara, who enjoys listening to music by herself because she finds it relaxing
Michael, who barely works on his group science project because he knows someone else will do the work
Stacy, who does all the social planning for her friends because she is good at it

content.answer: Michael, who barely works on his group science project because he knows someone else will do the work

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
